eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Adult patients undergoing Mohs micrographic surgery for non-melanoma skin cancers (basal cell carcinoma and squamous cell carcinoma)

Exclusion Criteria:

* history of liver transplant, hepatitis, or cirrhosis, those required to be NPO for subsequent closure by other surgical specialties, or those with known allergy to acetaminophen

outcomeMeasures.title: Maximum Pain Score
outcomeMeasures.description: Rated on a pain scale of 0-100. Higher score means worse outcome; lower score means better outcome.

outcomeMeasures.title: Thirst
outcomeMeasures.description: Rated on a thirst scale of 0-100. Higher score means worse outcome; lower score means better outcome.

outcomeMeasures.title: Hunger
outcomeMeasures.description: Rated on a hunger scale of 0-100. Higher score means worse outcome; lower score means better outcome.

outcomeMeasures.title: Anxiety
outcomeMeasures.description: Rated on n anxiety scale of 0-100. Higher score means worse outcome; lower score means better outcome.

outcomeMeasures.title: Fatigue
outcomeMeasures.description: Rated on a fatigue scale of 0-100. Higher score means worse outcome; lower score means better outcome.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants Using Post-operative Analgesic
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants using over the counter and prescribed non-opioid and opioid pain medications

outcomeMeasures.title: Maximum Post-op Pain Score
outcomeMeasures.description: Rated on a maximum post-op pain scale of 0-100. Higher score means worse outcome; lower score means better outcome.
